content: Write a paragraph on 'rainy day' where each word starts with the letter 'r'.

Rainy days, relentlessly refreshing, reveal rustic realms. Refreshed, residents revel in rhythmic raindrops, resonating through residential quarters. Roads, routinely repaved, reflect radiant rainbows when rays refract through residual rain. Relaxed, folks read romance novels, savoring rich, robust coffee. Restaurants, resplendent with rustic decor, offer renowned, regional recipes. Recreation areas remain relatively remote, as residents revel indoors, reminiscing about past rendezvous under rainy skies.RAINT
